press.title: Eby‚Äôamawulire
press.boilerplateBody: Chatforia ya pulogulamu ey‚Äôobubaka ey‚Äôamaanyi ku by‚Äôekiwuumiddwa, eyanguya okuteesa mu nnimi nnyingi. Obubaka bukuwa ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero, era okuvvu≈ã≈ãuzi kuyamba ku nnimi 100+ mu kiseera ekyo. Abakozesa bayinza okukozesa obubaka obuzikirira, okwefuga ‚Äòbyo abadde abyusomye‚Äô, n‚Äôokutoneeza ku byuma. Ewereddwayo ku iOS, Android, ne web.
press.scanTip: Ku kompyuta? Skenna ne ssimu ofune app.

careers.title: Emirimu
careers.intro: Tuli ttiimu entono ezimba omusonzi ogw‚Äôekyama, ogw‚Äôensi yonna. Bw‚Äôowulirira ekikalu ku kukuumibwa, okuyamba ku bantu bonna, n‚ÄôUX ennungi‚Äîtuwandiikire.
careers.openRoles: Emitendera egiriko awaka: Engineering (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Support.

about.title: Ebikwata ku Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia ye nsimbi y‚Äôobubaka ey‚Äôekuuma, ey‚Äôennimi nnyingi, n‚Äôokuyita/vidiyo. Eky‚Äôokukola kwaffe kirungi: okuyamba abantu okusisinkana‚Äîmu kyama, mu bwetonde, n‚Äôokuwandiika mu nnimi ez‚Äôenjawulo.

values.privacy: <bold>Obwannanyini ku ntikko:</bold> E2E encryption by default.
values.control: <bold>Okwefuga:</bold> Obubaka obuzikirira & ‚Äòbyo abadde abyusomye‚Äô bya ku londa.
values.privacy_aria: Obwannanyini ku ntikko: E2E encryption by default.
values.control_aria: Okwefuga: Obubaka obuzikirira n‚Äôeby‚Äôokusoma bya ku londa.

about.howDescription: Obubaka buvunyizibwa ku kyuma kyo nga tebunnavaayo. Okuvvu≈ã≈ãuzi, koppi, n‚Äôokutoneeza ku byuma okukolebwa ku ngeri ey‚Äôokwekuuma.

advertise.title: Weefuze ku Chatforia
advertise.description: Tuuke eri abakozesa abanyakiriza obubaka mu bifo ebitonde. Tulina banner, sponsorships, ne promos. Abakozesa Premium tebabulaba.

adsense.withPubId: Kati tukozesa Google AdSense. Bw‚Äôoyagala okututuukirira ku Google Ads, kozesa publisher ID {{pubId}} era osabe managed placement ku bitundu wammanga. Sponsorships zoosoboka‚Äîkozesa fomu.
adsense.noPubId: Kati tukozesa Google AdSense. Sponsorships ez‚Äôoku mukono nazo ziriwo‚Äîkozesa fomu wammanga.

advertise.noPlacements: Tewali bitundu byategekeddwa. Biyingize mu ads/placements.js.

account.q: Nkola ntya oba nzikiriza akaunta yange?
account.a: Ttikkula app oba kozesa web, nyiga ‚ÄúKola akaunta‚Äù, kkakasa email/ssimu. Okuziriza, kozesa ‚ÄúWyerabidde akasumuluzo‚Äù.

privacy.q: Obubaka bukuumibwa okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero?
privacy.a: Yee. Obubaka n‚Äôokuyita bikuumibwa bulungi. Ggwe n‚Äôoyo gw‚Äôowandiikira bokka mwe mubusoma.

translate.a: Yalula ‚ÄúAuto-translate‚Äù mu Settings ‚Üí Endabika & Olulimi. Tw‚Äôofuula ku kyuma wekisoboka, oba ku API ez‚Äôekuuma n‚Äôamatole gatonotono.

contact.a: Tusindikire ku support@chatforia.com. Teeka ebifaananyi n‚Äôenkyusa ya app yo.

intro.body: Eteeka lino lyanjula engeri Chatforia (‚Äúffe‚Äù, ‚Äúfwe‚Äù) gy‚Äôetuukiriza, etereeza, n‚Äôogabana ebikwata ku gwe nga okozesa ebitundu byaffe. Tuzimba Chatforia okwewala data ennyingi.

infoWeCollect.title: Bikwata ku gwe bye tufuna
infoWeCollect.account: Eby‚Äôakaunta (n.g., email/ssimu) okulonda n‚Äôokukuuma akaunta yo.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Ebirimu ebyekuuma (obubaka/okuyita) bikuumibwa okuva ku nkomerero okutuuka ku nkomerero; tetubisoma.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Ebirumirivu/eby‚Äôenkozesa nga crash logs, ekika ky‚Äôekyuma, oba analytics ebitonotono okuteekateeka enkola.

howWeUse.title: Engeri gye tukozesa ebikwata ku gwe

sharing.title: Okugabana
sharing.body: Tetugula data y‚Äôomukozzesa. Tuyinza okugabana data etono n‚Äôabo abatuyamba (n.g., push/analytics) wansi w‚Äôendagaano ez‚Äôamaanyi.

rights.title: Obuyinza bwo
rights.body: Okusinziira ku kitundu kyo (n.g., GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), oyinza okusaba okuyingira, okuteekateeka, okusangula, oba okugaana enkola ezimu. Tuukirirako: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Okutereka & Obukuumi
retention.body: Tutereka ebikakatiddwa byokka ebyetaagisa okutambuza omusonzi. E2E ebirimu tetusobola kubidukula.

children.title: Abaana
children.body: Chatforia teyetoloola baana abali wansi wa 13 (oba nga bw‚Äôeteeka ly‚Äôomu kitundu kyo bwe lyagamba).

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka
changes.body: Tujja kuteeka wano enkyukakyuka n‚Äôennaku z‚Äôebisembayo.

intro.body: Bw‚Äôokozesa Chatforia, okkiriza amateeka gano. Obutakkiriza‚Äîtakozesa buweereza.

accounts.title: Akaunta
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Wa obubaka obutuufu era okuumenga ebisumuluzo byo bulungi.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Ggwe omutaasizza ku byonna ebikolebwa ku akaunta yo.

acceptableUse.title: Enkozesa entuffu
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Tewali bintu bya mateeka, obukambwe, oba eby‚Äôobusuma; tewali spam oba kukozesa makina okusaasaanya.

yourContent.title: Ebirimu byo
yourContent.body: Ofuga ebirimu byo. Otuwa olukusa olwetaagisa okutambuza omusonzi (n.g., okuzza, okutereka, okuvvu≈ã≈ãula).

disclaimer.title: Okwewala Obuvunaanyizibwa
disclaimer.body: Omusonzi wetuwadde ‚Äònga bwe guli‚Äô nga tewali bya kusubizibwa. Okusinziira ku mateeka, Chatforia tebeera na buzibu ku byafuuka eby‚Äôobweralikirivu/eby‚Äôakaseera akawerako.

changes.title: Enkyukakyuka
changes.body: Tuyinza okujja ne nkyukakyuka; okweyongerayo ng‚Äôozikozesa kitegeeza okukkiriza.

doNotSell.title: Tonnetunda oba Okwabula Ebyange
doNotSell.body: Chatforia teritunda bikwata ku muntu. Naye ab‚ÄôCalifornia basobola okuwereza okusaba wansi wa CPRA wano wansi.

cookies.title: Entegeka za Cookies
cookies.body: Chatforia ekozesa cookies ntono (n.g., session, security). Tetukozesa cookies za butale za bulyomi. Fuga cookies mu ntegeka za browser yo.

phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Tewali nnamba ewerezeddwa. Londa mu kifo ky‚Äôennamba okutandika okusindikira obubaka.

accessibilitySettings.title: Okuyamba & Obunonyeze
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Ebilungi ebyo okukola Chatforia ennyangu nga tosobola okuwuliriza ddoboozi.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: Bitandika ku bungi obwa bulijjo. Yongera singa oyagala ennukuta ennene.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Obulabirizi mu lubaale ku bubaka & okuyita
Laga babbulo n‚Äôokubblinkinga taita itulu.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Kuwugumya nga wazuula obubaka obupya (nga kisoboka)
Koleza kuwugumya bwe waba obubaka.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Kumyansa sikulini nga wabadde okuyita
Wansi w‚Äôakaseera akatono nga okuyita kukuba.
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Kozesa amangu okufuula ebigambo mu byawandiikibwa
Gatta ekitini ku bubaka obw‚Äôamaloboozi obufuniddwa.
accessibilitySettings.visualAlerts: Obulabirizi mu lubaale ku bubaka & okuyita
